replies.body: L E G A T R E E     B O Y S
I guess I need to have watched the OPL to understand this. But I would rather play myself a game than watch that.  you see better plays in b5 than in OPL anyway ;)
ok, infernum crushed everyone flawlessly, then avant garde won a match against them then it went out 3-1 infernum, aqnd legacy smashed that other team, (i understand this and i dont watch opl)
how you go 3-1 in a 3 match series
i said i dont watch opl

you see this cause occasionally you get a bunch of players that dont belong in b5 and own the map because there team has a more tactically and skillful, EXPERIENCED team and just wana stomp nubs which is totally ok but totally unfair IMO.  Why do C$#@less player's need to or feel that they need to do this. Stay in your own ranked league and keep a fair ladder climb for all! its hard enough to play with a bunch of guys that you dont know in solo que with out haveing a romper stomper team to VS.
{{champion:64}} to the community and stop these comics pls
